New Records: Maheesh Theekshana faced 91 balls, the most by a No. 9 batter in a World Cup match
Key Match Events: Maheesh Theekshana added 43 runs in 87 balls for the last wicket along with Dilshan Madushanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Despite a 28-ball 51 from opener Kusal Perera, Sri Lanka crumbled as they lost 5 wickets in the first powerplay
Others: Trent Boult picked up 3 wickets with the new ball, finding some form while Lockie Ferguson, Mitchell Santner and Rachin Ravindra picked up 2 wickets each
